text: I have worked with Salt & Paperie on multiple projects as a photographer and client and Jacki is one of the best wedding vendors that I have the privilege of working with. text: Jacki was amazing to work with! She helped us figure out what we wanted and customized invitations for us. They turned out better than we even expected. She was reasonably priced and had a quick turn around time. I highly recommend Jacki!

name: Shannon Armstrong
text: Jacki was an absolute DREAM to work with on our wedding invitations! I have seen her work on social media through several of our mutual friends. Although she’s from my hometown of Huntsville, AL and we attended the same alma mater (Roll Tide!), I have never met her in person. In fact, I now live in Houston, TX and worked with her remotely via quick phone calls and email. She is the easiest, most understanding person to work with. I gave her a direction I wanted to go for my destination/mountain wedding and she perfected a suite and customized map that had our guests in awe. To this day, I am still getting compliments on how classy and composed the invites were. The map of our venues was absolute perfection!!! She was timely, organized, reasonably priced, and most importantly: she does amazing work. We actually ended up (last minute) adding on place cards, table numbers, and a large seating chart... all of which were delivered to me in a snap. I can’t recommend her enough and I will always cherish these symbols of our special day! Thank you, Jacki!!!!

name: Ashlyn Knaur
text: Jacki did a PERFECT job designing and producing my wedding invitations and bridesmaid luncheon invitations. I highly recommend Salt + Paperie to anyone looking for beautiful, customized wedding stationary. Jacki was so easy to work with, responsive to my e-mails, adhered to our proposed timeline, and offered reasonable pricing for the extremely high-quality product she provided. There are a few things I might change about my wedding planning if I had the chance, but using Salt + Paperie is definitely not one of them - my invitations, programs, etc. were absolutely perfect. I will use Jacki's services for any invitation needs I have in the future!

name: Andrea M. Kring
text:
When we buy a car, we consider so many details that will reflect our individuality.  The make, model, color, price, even the tires are elements that ultimately reflect what is important to each of us.  Can you imagine not considering the engine?  What good is our vehicle if we don’t have structural integrity under the hood? It would be nothing more than a pretty yard ornament and certainly wouldn’t take you far.

I was drawn to Strong Automotive because I could see it had structural integrity.  I watched the company for over a year before I decided to consider working with them.  On the exterior, it looked bright, energetic, and fun.  When I took a look under the hood, I found in this agency a diverse, highly creative, and dedicated group of people who want one thing:  to be kind of engine that drives customers to your product. Every department at this agency works closely together like a well-oiled machine (pun intended) that is always being tweaked and improved to make sure it runs smoother and faster than the day before.

When you consider Strong to represent your business, you can know that the people who make up the company truly love what they do and they are excited about working for you.  Thanks to John Paul Strong, we have a work environment that allows us to be that high-quality engine you need to drive clients to your business. #WEARESTRONG

resp.text: Thanks for your review, Andrea!

name: Luke Thomas
text:
To create the best product, you’ve got to have the best team. Strong Automotive Merchandising has got this down pat. The people behind this agency are friendly, creative, and diverse. Plus, the leadership understands how important it is to stay fresh with training, career development, and providing an awesome place to work.
For customers it’s a surefire way to drive traffic, for employees it’s a workplace full of opportunity. Either way, you can’t go wrong when you choose Strong.

text:
The staff at Fast Sign, specifically Wyndi Avery and Milton awesome!!!  They provide customer service that goes beyond exceptional and they assist you in building a brand for your business.  I went to see them for a design logo for my new medical practice having no clue what I wanted.  They worked intimately with me on the details and they then drafted various logos for my liking at a very reasonable cost.  They provided guidance and made recommendations on what type of signage would be noticeable without going over my budget.   Even when I pointed out mistakes or issues they corrected them with no arguing or hassle.
They have a genuine concern for their clients and their circumstances which I have witnessed on various occasions.  This is a character and quality rarely demonstrated in any profession today but it is a standard of their business and I commend them for their excellent customer service.  If you are looking to brand your business or to build your next signage for your business and if you want the best in customer service then go see Fast Sign and you will never regret it!

name: Jeffrey Baker
text:
Well, here's the short version: ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND.
To give you an idea of the attention to detail paid here: Gavin does 100% of the work himself, and that's normally 2 cars per day, max. But when I called him on a Wednesday trying to get my Tesla done for a Saturday show, he made it happen, despite being booked solid. I dropped her off at 5 on Thursday and he rolled it in to get started that night, and the next morning the job was done.
Not only does it look AMAZING, but I'm running my AC a good 10 degrees warmer to achieve the same comfort. These brutal summer days were pushing it to the limit, even with a fresh recharge, but now I can actually set it to the temp I want and it'll get there instead of struggling. So, not just a great aesthetic improvement, but a real boost to efficiency, meaning I can drive farther on a charge and spend less overall. I'd go back in a heartbeat, and I'd recommend him to anyone I know as well.

name: Shannon Mason
text:
The Office of Marketing & Public Relations at University of Mobile use FastSigns exclusively, because they are true to their name – we get quality signs very fast! The team at FastSigns, especially Pauline, is incredible to work with, throughout the entire process. Their customer service is excellent and some of the best I have ever worked with! Pauline is very personable and approachable, and always works to get us the best pricing on quality products. She goes the extra mile to get to know our projects in order to make our sometimes extravagant visions come to life. She is always able to be reached by phone or email, and responds quickly with estimates. Her staff has adopted this mindset as well, as they ensure that everything from the installations to the billing process is as smooth as possible.

Frank, one of the installers, is the best in the business! He works long hours and always does our installations. We look forward to seeing him on campus, because we know that if Frank is here, it will be done right! We can always count on him to be professional and do a great job.

Outside of University of Mobile, I have used FastSigns for several personal projects and every time they excel and meet my demands! No matter the project, Pauline & her staff are the only name we trust in the sign business to take on our signage requests. They can just about do it all! It’s always a pleasure to work with them!

name: Lila Johnson
text: I had an awful experience dealing with this company and will never go back. The so-called co-owner, Pauline I believe her name is, took it upon herself to take on my order. I was in charge of the decorations for my 20-year high school reunion, and one of my tasks was to have posters made from our old year book to set up for a display. I figured Fastsigns would be the place to go since they specialize in that type of work. I was assured that the posters would be of high quality and on time. However, when I came in to pick up my posters, they weren’t even ready and were horribly distorted. I was very perturbed to find this out seeing as how I was spending over $300.00 on these posters. Pauline, who was in charge, wouldn’t even personally confront me about this issue, she had one of her employees who was more helpful than Pauline was, bare the grunt. Pauline was also unprofessional as I saw her talk down to one of her employees and treated her poorly right in front of me! Needless to say, I took my business elsewhere to SignPro and they did a wonderful job in a fraction of the time.

name: Shelley Belly
text:
I'm so glad I found this company to handle a friend's marketing!  She had paid a few thousand dollars for "web marketing" and contacted me to complain that she couldn't be found on Google Search.

I decided to Google "Internet Marketing Services in Montgomery, Alabama" and they are ranked #1!!  If they can do it for themselves, then they can do it for my friend / and THEY DID!!  They practice what they preach!!

Thank you, Vernon & Bizeeo Web Marketing.

resp.text: Hi Shelley! You know how much I appreciate you and your kind words. It pains me that small business owners spend their advertising and marketing dollars where they are ineffective. I hear horror stories like these from potential clients on a regular basis. I always advise them, whether they hire me or not, to "do this and do that" and "ask this and ask that" BEFORE selecting their next marketing agency. There are simply too many marketing service providers that over promise and under deliver, selling services that they know are not in the best interest of their clients. Even worse, many so-called "web marketing" agencies are experienced only with "traditional" marketing such as print, radio, or television, but expanded their services into the web arena in order to survive (or be more profitable). While most of these agencies are excellent at providing "traditional" marketing services, many of them are wholly unqualified to provide any type of online marketing services. They might be able to produce a "pretty" website, but that is a far cry from what is required to implement a successful, comprehensive web marketing campaign. Thanks again for leaving a review and allowing me to vent :-), Vernon Blake - Internet Marketing Specialist

name: Mickey Thompson
text:
I came back here again to thank Vernon and Shelley for the excellent work they continue to do for our business after all these years. We still have no need to do any other marketing or advertising other than the work they do for us, and I I can go about doing what I do best, and leave them to handle what they do best. I trust them implicitly and thank them for always being available when we need them.

In this day and age, it’s so nice to be able to do business with honest, decent, upstanding folks like these.

For the 7th year in a row, we have won the TripAdvisor award for best restaurant in Prattville.
- - - -
My restaurant is off the beaten path in downtown Prattville, AL making it a challenge to attract new customers. In the past, I paid to advertise in the local newspaper, print magazines, print and Internet yellow pages and an online paid listing, with limited success. I hired Bizeeo over 2 years ago (October 2012) to market my restaurant online.

They manage my website, social media, business listings and online reviews (reputation management). Since then, growth has exceed 25% for 2 consecutive years.  Due to our success with Bizeeo Marketing, I've discontinued all other forms of advertising.

Also, this year (2015), our restaurant won TripAdvisor's Certificate of Excellence award (out of 99 restaurants). This is the 3rd year in a row we have won this award. I highly recommend Bizeeo - you can see for yourself online what they've done for us.

resp.text: Hi Mickey, we have learned so much about online marketing (we are ALWAYS learning) while maintaining your website and other web properties. The biggest take-away is for some industries (your Prattville business is an example), FAR more time and effort is devoted to marketing tasks "off" the website, like managing online reviews and promoting your brand via social media. Of course, the foundation of it all is we are fortunate enough to work with a business owner that KNOWS what customer satisfaction is all about. And... congratulations on your TripAdvisor "Certificate of Excellence" award for 2016... 4th YEAR IN A Row! And thanks for taking time to leave the nice review.

I’ve been a customer for 4 years now and I am always pleased at how well the Huntsville team always handles my orders, regardless of how much or how little time I give them.  They routinely produce my orders and have them shipped to the locations of my choice, and always on time and perfectly completed.
A huge thank you for always helping me look good and professional.

text: Minuteman Press has printed our company materials for the past few years.  They came highly recommended by someone else in the printing business and have created professional material for us in a timely manner.  I recommend them to anyone who needs something professionally printed.

text:
Minuteman always does an above and beyond job with all of their printing jobs. Anything from one-off projects to thousands of items, Jonathan and the whole staff always make sure to end product is professional, clean, and cost-efficient. Even for (admittedly) last-minute jobs, I know I don't have to worry after I hand my artwork off to Minuteman--they'll get the job done! :)

I will recommend them to anyone!!

name: danny newton
text:
Used their services several times. Every single time, they tell me it will be ready at a time and date. I show up after that time to pick it up, walk in, and it is NEVER READY! THIS IS EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING. No, I do not want to return later. No I do not want to sit in the lobby and wait for you to make it happen. Have it ready when you say it will be ready.

Last time I was there the manager said, "I thought I told you it would be ready tomorrow" I proceeded to read him the email he sent to me the day before saying it would be ready. He said "oh, I'll have it in 5 minutes"

I have decided to go with another printer.

resp.text:
Wow, I am very sorry that you had a bad experience with Minuteman Press and especially with me.  I am not aware of this situation.  Please contact me at your convenience so that I may be able to resolve the issues and hopefully provide a solution that will help.
Jonathan
